about_the_game:
This is a roguelike game that combines action and card elements, presented in a third-person, over-the-shoulder 3D perspective. In the game, players defeat opponents to obtain cards, equipment, experience, and money, continuously enhancing their abilities to defeat the next opponent until all opponents have been vanquished by you. The game simultaneously tests your skills and strategy. As the game progresses, you will get closer to becoming the Supreme of the Canyon until you are finally crowned!

The game features:

Solid combat feel: Precise attack and hit detection ensure well-timed frame freezes, while 17 hit animations provide excellent visual presentation.

Deep damage mechanics: Similar to Dota's equipment and passive mechanisms, you can engage in strategically rich combat by considering the characteristics of your class, the enemies, and your playstyle.

Low-end device friendly: I have a high-resolution lightweight laptop with an AMD 7840H processor, and it can still run smoothly at 60 FPS on high graphics settings at 2k resolution.

The game currently includes 154 cards with different abilities, 53 pieces of equipment, and 23 unique combat levels, including 14 regular levels, 4 fun levels, and 5 boss levels.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-7100, AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 1030, AMD Radeon R7 240 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: This is an ancient arena nestled within a canyon, imbued with mysterious card powers. How to wield the power of the cards to defeat challengers and ascend to become the Supreme of the Canyon is the ultimate pursuit for any brave soul who comes here! Are you ready to face the challenge?
